title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a Secure Foundation for SAP RISE and Non-SAP Workload (NTA318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为 SAP RISE 和非 SAP 工作负载构建安全基础 (NTA318)
abstract: Discover how global enterprises successfully migrate SAP RISE and non-SAP workloads to AWS. This session explores the critical foundational aspects of AWS cloud migration, showcasing the implementation of a multi-account strategy that optimizes security and resource management.You'll learn how to build a secure landing zone, set up comprehensive backups, and establish integrated Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) capabilities.Learn how these key elements formed the backbone of AWS cloud migration, supporting both SAP and non-SAP ecosystems. You'll gain insights into overcoming challenges and implementing strategies that can accelerate AWS cloud adoption.
abstract_cn: 了解全球企业如何成功将SAP RISE和非SAP工作负载迁移到AWS。本次会议探讨AWS云迁移的关键基础方面，展示多账户策略的实施，以优化安全性和资源管理。您将学习如何构建安全的着陆区、设置全面的备份以及建立集成的安全信息和事件管理(SIEM)功能。了解这些关键要素如何构成AWS云迁移的支柱，支持SAP和非SAP生态系统。您将获得克服挑战和实施策略的见解，从而加速AWS云采用。

presenter.name: Syafili Lie
presenter.title: Head of Solutions Architecture, Canada Enterprise Greenfield
